title: What is the intelligent edge?
itunes:title: What is the intelligent edge?
description: Advanced connectivity, the Internet of Things, and artificial intelligence are converging to drive the next evolution of the digital world. Only now it’s becoming physical, digital, and intelligent. Tune in to the podcast to learn about the intelligent edge network—what it is, how it’s being used, and why it’s so important.
